Summary: 2 star like object seen in san fernando valley ca area.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around August 5th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsoutside at 10:50pm looking at clear night sky towards west when i saw a star like object with an increasing glow & increase in size lasted 2 sec stationary then moved nw for aproxx 3 sec then started exiting the atmosphere at high rate of speed the glow was fading took another 3 sec till it disappeared got smaller. 1min after that same star like object entered at a high rate of speed from south to north stops the exiting the atmospher with a bright flicker of white blue & silver colors, this past week i seen 2 shooting stars but this one enterd directly towards earth then left at another angle, both star like objects took aproxx 5 to 6sec each observed.
